author: wmw
post: There is nothing really new in the last 24 yrs. Except this chart and a couple cites. See Stephen Jones at http://tinyurl.com/nedtsvg where he publishes Dr. Jackson’s whole 1991 paper as a blog post. He had permission. That paper was based on a March 1990 article in Shroud Spectrum International at https://www.shroud.com/pdfs/ssi34part3.pdf.
title: Déjà vu Squared
